para.text: Another important point to beware of, occurs when debugging an applet with a development

that is already open in another Dolphin session. It is perfectly permissible to do this, but you will be warned when the second copy of the image starts. If you choose to go ahead then you must be careful not to make simultaneous changes in both sessions otherwise you risk corrupting your change log and losing work.
